# Extreme Networks ExtremeXOS Stacking Configuration
# X460-G2 SummitStack

configure snmp sysname "exos-stack-01"

# Enable Stacking
enable stacking

# Configure Stacking Priorities
configure stacking node-address 00:04:96:xx:xx:xx priority 100
configure stacking node-address 00:04:96:yy:yy:yy priority 50

# Configure Alternate IP
configure stacking alternate-ip-address automatic

# Stacking VLANs
create vlan "StackMgmt" tag 999
configure vlan StackMgmt ipaddress 10.255.255.1/24

# Stacking Ports
configure stacking-support stack-ports 1:53-1:54 selection native
configure stacking-support stack-ports 2:53-2:54 selection native

# Stack Easy Setup
configure stacking easy-setup
